textAfterTable: Buy-outs Name Cap Hit Chris Drury 1,666,667 Total 1,666,667 Totals Cap Hit Cap Ceiling 10% Cushion Cap Space $56,690,956 $64,300,000 $70,730,000 $14,039,044 At the very least, expect Biron to be signed to a similar deal as last year (875,000) and Prust to get a decent sized raise... say to $1.3m or so. prust had 12 less points than he did last year, why should he get a raise?
